The primary endpoint study evaluate persistence , term frequency , magnitude quality , anti-Tat humoral cellular immune response HIV-1 infected individual participate ISS T-002 receive least 3 immunization . The secondary endpoint define validate novel laboratory test future efficacy clinical trial .
